question:
[Rufus]'s aunt [Elizabeth] likes to drink a little bit too much wine at family gatherings. [Tommy] took his grandson [David] to the park on Saturday and they had a good time. [Spencer] took his sister [Elizabeth] out to lunch after learning that she got accepted into her first choice for university. [Judy] has not seen her brother, [Spencer] in over a year. She wants to take her son, [David] to meet him. [Reynaldo] was eating lunch with his son [Rufus] and his wife [Maxine].
Question: How is [Tommy] related to [Maxine]?
